=== About Mohammad: ===

My name is Mohammad Abbasi , I was born in Iran and lived there with my parents Mahgol Abbasi and Reza Abbasi until I was 15 , My aspirations and goals are to combine my technical skills with business and leadership experiences in order to become a well-rounded professional in the world of business and technology .

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Mohammad 's contributions to Ubuntu And Gnome  can be summarized as:

 1- Maintaining and developing text rendering, font, and Unicode related issues in the GTK+ stack
 2- Optimization in low-level libraries as well as login/boot performance analysis
 3- Non-coding contributions: Board matters, conference organization, etc
